Installation

Without Git

  1. Download the repository as a zip file from Github

  2. Extract the zip file

  3. Open a command prompt inside the folder

  4. Descend down the directory tree until you see a folder labelled “easydrive”. Do not go into that folder.

  5. Execute one of these commands:

Windows

py -m pip install .

Mac/Linux

python3 -m pip install .

With Git

Windows

git clone https://github.com/PascalRombach/py-easydrive
cd py-easydrive
py -m pip install .

Mac/Linux

git clone https://github.com/PascalRombach/py-easydrive
cd py-easydrive
python3 -m pip install .
